#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
long int power(int a,int b){
    long int res=1;
    while(b--){
        res*=(long)a;
    }
    return res;
}
int main(){
    char a[11];
    cin>>a;
    while(strcmp(a,"#")){
        long int no=atoi(a);
        long int temp=0,count=0,t;
        int j,i=1;
        while(1){
                temp=i*9*power(10,i-1);
                if(count+temp>no||i==9)
                break;
                count+=temp;
                i++;
        }
        no-=count;
        if(no%i)
        cout<<"Impossible!\n";
        else{
                t=no/i;
                temp=power(10,i-1)-1+t;
                cout<<temp<<endl;
        
        }
        cin>>a;
    }
}
